content: >this pattern is available also on payhip 1 with pay what you want option the english title of the pattern is **the empress mittens** >alkuperäinen ohje suomeksi ullassa 2/16 2 huomaathan että suomenkielisessä ohjeessa on vain yksi koko päivitetyssä englanninkielisessä versiossa the empress mittens on kaksi pituusvaihtoehtoa --- the empress mittens were designed to match the emperor s bride socks 3 **pattern features ** - yardage approximately 30-40 grams of each two colours - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - one stitch count but two length options - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork - proof read / tech edited by helena kahan 1 https //payhip com/b/j9hlm 2 http //www ullaneule net/0216/ohjeet_keisarinna html 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/keisarin-morsian
